definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: To the right were eight tall porcelain urinals.
sentences.chinese: 右邊是八個高大的陶瓷小便器。

sentences.english: Place the net under you toilet seat so it will be ready when you need it.
sentences.chinese: 當需要時準備，請把網子放好在坐便器下。

sentences.english: You’re washing your hands on the top of the toilet?
Secondly we looked for water saving toilets.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我們使用節水型的坐便器。

sentences.english: Urinal does not need to be removed from wall for snaking.
sentences.chinese: 小便器並不需要從牆上取下爲蜿蜒。

sentences.english: The Urinal flush valve is able to be connected with top or rear water inlet urinal ceramics.
sentences.chinese: 吉博力小便沖洗閥可與上進水或後進水的小便器相連。

sentences.english: The water inlet of the toilet is communicated with a tap water pipe through a valve.
sentences.chinese: 所述坐便器的進水口通過閥門與自來水管連通。

sentences.english: Due to the multiple types of the closets, the shapes of the sewer outlets of the closets are different and irregular.
sentences.chinese: 由於座便器種類很多，其下水口形狀各異不規則。

sentences.english: Crouch implement change sit implement, accept osculum restriction.
sentences.chinese: 蹲便器改坐便器，受排水孔限制。

sentences.chinese: 蹲便器改坐便器，受排水孔限制。

sentences.english: People on the bathroom equipment in the bathtub and asked Toilet is getting higher and higher.
sentences.chinese: 人們對衛浴設備中的浴缸和坐便器要求也是越來越高。

sentences.english: Shower Dividers, Dressing Compartments, and Urinal Screens Selector Chart.
sentences.chinese: 淋浴隔斷，更衣室隔間，以及小便器隔斷選項表。

definition: chamber pot/wooden pan used as toilet/toilet bowl
Turkish toilet/squat toilet/to vacate one's bowels
